amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to encouraging expedited approval of liquefied natural gas export applications at the Department of Energy.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 448 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 448 proposed by Senator Gardner. (consideration: CR S1971; text: CR S1971) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to encouraging expedited approval of liquefied natural gas export applications at the Department of Energy.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 448 proposed by Senator Gardner.
